pullRequest.title: Return HTTP/1.1 connection to the pool after request is complete
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation:
When an HTTP/1.1 connection is reused, the connection should be returned to the pool after the request and response are complete.
Modification:

Return the HTTP/1.1 connection to the pool after request and response are complete if pipelining is not enabled.

Result:

You no longer see EncoderException when reusing the HTTP/1.1 connections.
